title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Tuesday, 1 December 2015 - BBC News
summary: the mother of a teenage girl killed at a level crossing 10 years ago says she was upset to find a safety feature at the site not working .
a danbury turkey farmer says he 's having to hire workers from eastern europe because people from essex are too `` ashamed '' to do farm work .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates have finished for today but we 'll have more news , sport , weather and travel updates for essex from 08:00 on wednesday .
see you then !

documents.title: crohn 's disease 'disadvantage ' for ali carter
text: chelmsford 's ali carter says his battle with crohn 's disease put him at a `` disadvantage '' in his third round match at the uk snooker championship .
he was beaten 6-2 by john higgins yesterday .
carter has struggled with the condition , which affects the digestive system , for years .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: weather : cloudy and dry night
text: it will be mainly cloudy and dry overnight .
temperatures will be very mild for the time of year , but strong south-westerly winds will give a fresher feel .
minimum temperature : 10c ( 50f ) .
tomorrow is expected to be dry through much of the day , with brighter spells developing in places , particularly in the east .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: colchester announce squad for tonight 's cup tie
text: colchester united have included several professionals in their squad for their fourth round match in thebbc essex senior cup tonight .
the u 's are at home to canvey island and will have kane vincent-young , george elokobi and sammie szmodics in their ranks .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: whereabouts of suspected illegal immigrants unknown
text: the whereabouts of seven suspected illegal immigrants seen fleeing the back of a lorry in clacton yesterday morning remains unknown .
essex police says it has arrested a 44-year-old polish man on sus of facilitating illegal entry into the uk following the incident in old road .
a short while ago the force told me their investigation continues , but they are not involved in the search for the group .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: headlines : clacton suspected illegal immigrants whereabouts unknown and essex mps on syrian air strikes
text: here are your top stories for essex this afternoon :
author: Tom Croasdell
BBC Essex

documents.title: organisers defend colchester 's castle park winter wonderland after criticism from visitors
text: winter wonderland bosses have defended their festive event in colchester after receiving complaints from disgruntled punters .
author: Daily Gazette

documents.title: person trapped in car on a133 colchester road
text: essex fire and rescue says crews are currently working to release one person trapped in their car following an accident on the a133 colchester road .
the road is currently blocked in both directions .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a133 colchester road blocked in both directions
text: the a133 colchester road in elmstead market is blocked in both directions blocked due to a two vehicle accident near church road .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: unsolved murder daughter describes still living in a 'nightmare '
text: on 1 december 1990 , essex accountant patrick hurling was found murdered , but his killers have never been caught .
today his daughter said the family was still `` grieving under a cloud '' .
lorna ringer ( was 19 when her father was killed : `` i 've been living a nightmare for 25 years we 're still grieving with many , many questions '' .
author: Paul Joslin
BBC Essex

documents.title: watch : ten years on since elsenham rail deaths
text: the mother of one of two teenagers killed at a level crossing in essex says 10 years after her daughter 's death she still has concerns about safety at the station .

documents.title: picture of the day : canvey pool
text: thank you to roy essery from the colchester photographic society who shared this of canvey pool with us .
we are always on the look out for your snaps of the county .
you can email them , tweet them , or post them on our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: how will your mp vote on the uk 's involvement in syria ?
text: i have now spoken to all 18 of our essex mps on how they plan to vote on the uk 's involvement in syrian air strikes .
all have said they will vote with the government , with the following exceptions :
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: european turkey farm workers on why they come to essex
text: a polish worker at a turkey farm in essex has told me he came to the county because he can earn more money here .
it comes as the owner of kelly turkeys in danbury says he 's having to hire workers from abroad because he ca n't find people from essex to do the job , despite offering £ 500 a week .
yasack is one of the eastern european workers at the factory .
he said : `` in poland you can earn £ 300 a month , but here it 's three times more than that '' .
author: Robby West
BBC Essex

documents.title: clacton flat fire investigation launched
text: essex fire and rescue tells us it has launched an investigation after a flat fire in clacton this morning .
the service says it was called to knox road at just after 08:30 .
the blaze was extinguished at 09:10 - we have not been told of any injuries .

documents.title: bevan back in gym after double leg break
text: sport can be cruel sometimes - just ask brinn bevan .
a few weeks after helping britain to a historic silver medal at the world championships he fractured his left leg in two places .
it happened at another team competition and puts a big question mark on his chances of making the rio olym
but he told me today he will give it his best shot and is not writing it off .
he 's back in the gym already doing simple stretches .
author: Jonathan Park
BBC Look East sport

documents.title: polish man arrested after people seen fleeing from lorry
text: a man has been arrested on sus of facilitating illegal entry after a number of people were seen fleeing a lorry in clacton .
essex police tell us four men and three women are believed to have run off after the rear doors of the vehicle were opened on old road yesterday .
they have not been traced .
a 44-year-old polish man has been released on police bail until march 2016 .
author: Claire Sawyer
BBC Essex

documents.title: pregnant woman 's terror as she 's attacked by a dog
text: a pregnant woman was taken to hospital after being savaged by a dog .
author: Southend Echo

documents.title: headlines : man re-arrested over angela millington murder and braintree rapist jailed
text: here are the stories we 're looking at in the newsroom this afternoon :
author: Tom Croasdell
BBC Essex

documents.title: travel : colchester trains disrupted due to fire alarm
text: greater anglia says an earlier alarm from a signal box in colchester will disrupt services until 17:00 .
# colchester services may still be cancelled , delayed by up to 60 mins or revised .
disruption is expected until 17:00 .

documents.title: essex girl handed 'fat shaming ' card
text: police in london are investigating a group of people who have been handing out abusive cards on the london underground to people they consider to be fat .
british transport police has asked anyone who is targeted to contact them , after a woman from essex said she was given a card that described her as `` a fat , ugly human '' .
writing on facebook , kara florish from benfleet said she was `` smaller than the national average and not exactly obese '' .
author: Samantha Dalton
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex level crossing schoolgirl deaths 10-year timeline
text: on 3 december 2005 , charlotte thompson and olivia bazlinton were killed after being hit by an express train at a level crossing in elsenham .
here 's what happened after their death :
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : dry and cloudy afternoon
text: it will be mostly dry and cloudy this afternoon .
feeling mild , but also breezy , most notably in clacton-on-sea and harwich .
maximum temperature : 13c ( 55f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: mps to back 'overdue ' air strikes in syria
text: i 've heard back from two more essex mps on how they plan to vote on proposed air strikes in syria tomorrow :
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: man rearrested over angela millington murder
text: in the past few minutes , essex police says a man has been rearrested in connection with the murder of angela millington ( right ) .
the remains of the 33-year-old from southend , who was last seen in november 2013 , were found washed up on foulness island on 21 june 2014 .
it 's not known how she died , or how long she had been there .
detectives say a 67-year-old man from eastwood , who has originally arrested on 20 april and on bail , has been taken back into custody on sus of murder .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: essex ukip mp 'undecided ' on syria air strike vote
text: douglas carswell , the ukip mp for clacton , tells me he is `` genuinely undecided '' on how to vote on proposed air strikes in syria .
mr carswell says he has received a briefing on privy council terms with some members of the security council .
he says he will listen to ministers and their critics during tomorrow 's commons debate and then make up his mind .
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: sports personality of the year : contenders for 2015
text: basildon 's max whitlock is in the running to become the bbc sports personality of the year 2015 - but who is he up against ?
here is a round-up of the 12 contenders :

documents.title: baby was a passenger in vehicle involved in essex collision
text: a baby was a passenger in a vehicle involved in a road traffic collision in essex this morning .
author: Harlow Star

documents.title: network rail response to elsenham crossing concerns
text: network rail says a safety feature installed at a level crossing in elsenham where two teenagers were killed has now been fixed .
oliva bazlinton was one of the girls killed .
her mother tina hughes ( said she was upset when she found the automatic locking system was n't working last week .
since then a network rail spokesperson told us problems with the crossing meant it was `` shut temporarily '' , but these have now been resolved .

documents.title: braintree rapist jailed for 11 years
text: a braintree man is starting an 11-year jail sentence today after being found guilty of three counts of rape and two counts of sexual assault .
chelmsford crown court heard kujtin rexha , 43 , of jeffreys road , was arrested in may following an investigation into offences at a car wash in colchester road , little bentley .
his victim , who is from romania and was 17 at the time , was made to sleep in his caravan against her will for two-and-a-half months .
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: headlines : braintree man jailed for rape and whitlock nominated for sports personality of the year
text: if you 're just joining us , here are the top stories in essex this morning :
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex conservative mp to vote against syrian airstrikes
text: an essex conservative mp will vote against airstrikes in syria , the bbc understands .
it 's believed john baron who represents basildon and billericay will not back david cameron over the uk bombing so-called islamic state targets in syria .
we 're looking at how other essex mps will vote in the commons tomorrow - more details as we get them .

documents.title: ronnie o'sullivan to compete at masters in january
text: chigwell 's five-time world champion ronnie o'sullivan has confirmed he will return to snooker at the masters at wembley in january .
he has not played since losing in the world championship quarter-final in april .
o'sullivan said only last week that it would take a `` huge change in mindset '' for him to return to playing , but he tweeted last night that he was looking forward to playing at the masters .

author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: essex accountant murder appeal 25 years on
text: the family of an essex accountant who was murdered 25 years ago is appealing for help to find his killers .
the body of patrick hurling , 45 , who worked in waltham abbey , was found dead at his home in bengeo street , hertford , on 1 december 1990 .
he had been beaten and a fire had been started in the house .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: dramatic photo of wickford fire last night
text: residents on one wickford street were woken up to a large garage blaze last night .
crews were originally called to a car on fire in drownsea drive just before midnight , but on arrival it had spread to two adjoining garages and two other cars .
david capper tweeted this photo adding : `` great job guys getting the fire in wickford under control quickly .
all safe only cars and garage damaged '' .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: max whitlock up for bbc sports personality of the year
text: basildon gymnast max whitlock is one of 12 contenders in the running for this year 's sports personality of the year .
the 22-year-old became the first man to win a gold for great britain at the world gymnastics championships in october .
a gymnast has never won the bbc award , although beth tweddle was fifth in 2009 .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: axe burglar e-fit released
text: an e-fit has been released of one of two men suspected of using an axe during an attempted burglary in leigh-on-sea .
the victim answered a knock at the door at about 21:00 on 15 november , two youths demanded money and attempted to force their way inside the property , police say .
as the man tried to close his door , one suspect is said to have hit it with an axe before fleeing .
you can see a full description of the men here .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: road rage driver rams car
text: a driver was left fearing for his life after he was almost rammed off the road in a suspected road rage incident in dedham .
essex police says the motorist was hit multiple times by a range rover as he overtook the 4x4 on birchwood road on 15 november .
the victim is said to have almost come off the road into a field .
his car was damaged , but he managed to escape any injuries .
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex workers tell turkey farmer to get stuffed
text: it 's the centrepiece of many of our christmas dinners , but according to one farmer essex workers are too `` ashamed '' to work in a turkey factory .
paul kelly ( left ) , who runs kellys turkeys in danbury , told me he 's struggling to find staff from the county so is having to employ workers from eastern europe .
`` as a nation we 've been removed from the realities of farming , '' mr kelly said .
author: Robby West
BBC Essex

documents.title: safety failure at elsenham rail deaths crossing 10 years on
text: the mother of an essex teenager who was killed at a level crossing 10 years ago says she was upset to find a safety feature at the site not working .
charlotte thompson ( left ) , 13 , and olivia bazlinton , 14 , were hit by a train at the crossing in elsenham , on 3 december 2005 .
an automatic locking system failed last week .
the system has since been repaired , but tina hughes said : `` it 's the 10th anniversary and i expected elsenham to be perfectly safe . ''
we 'll bring you what network rail had to say later .

documents.title: weather : outbreaks of rain initially , then becoming drier , milder and breezy
text: there will be outbreaks of light rain and drizzle at first this morning before it becomes mostly dry , with a few bright or sunny intervals .
today will be rather mild , but also breezy .
maximum temperature : 13c ( 55f ) .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: welcome to tuesday 's local live page
text: morning , it 's december - can you believe it ?
the team and i will bring you all the latest news , sport , weather and travel for essex until 18:00 .
if you 'd like to get in touch , you can email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
